title: peNmaiyE shaktiyaDA
sahitya:
peNmaiyE shaktiyaDA adai vaNangum perumaiyE buddhiyaDA mara manidA


anupallavi

  kaNNiraNDenavE kAdaluDan kUDi kAsini vAzhndiDak-kaDavuL ingE aLitta


caraNam    Aninrip-peNNillai peNNinri Anillai akhila ulagamellAm AN-peN viLaiyATTE
pUNum ponnum pOlE pUvum maNamum pOlE porundi iru bAlarum tirundinArp-payan perap-
